If I have the story right. The Admiral is in charge of all the ship girls. The ship girls love the Admiral. Kashima loves the Admiral and does not want anyone else to have him. Any female that gets close to the Admiral, she has them have sex with someone else to try to get them away from said Admiral. The Admiral knows of what Kashima does but keeps her around and lets it happen. Maybe he likes it, maybe he feels guilty he can't answer all their feelings, maybe he's just a coward. If Kashima does want to be with the Admiral, if she has sex with anyone other than him, then the story won't make sense. But then again, that's how it usually goes.
